head.title: Covid-19 - East Gibson School District

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

p.span: Check here for School updates related to the

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-size-adjust: auto; font-family: Helvetica;

p.span: East Gibson School Corporation Schedule (during school closure) March 16 - April 14
Monday, March 16: Teachers and staff will report to
buildings at 8:00 - 3:00 for staff meeting with principals and to begin preparations for eLearning days.
Monday, March 16: Students will be allowed to enter building to get necessary materials for eLearning sessions 8:00 - 3:00.
Monday, March 23 - Friday March 27: Monday, March 30 - Friday April 3: Monday, April 6 - Thursday April 9: Friday, April 10:

Spring Break eLearning Sessions Waived days (4)
No school
No school
Waived days (4)

a. Tuesday, April 14: Teachers and staff will report to
buildings at 8:00 - 3:00 for staff meeting with
principals and to begin preparations for future eLearning
days. Principals and staff will adhere to social distancing and guidelines.
Monday, April 20 - Friday April 24 eLearning Sessions a. Monday, April 20: Students will be allowed to enter

building to get necessary materials for eLearning sessions
8:00 - 3:00. Also return any previous academic work. Social distancing and guidelines will be adhered to upon entering building
Monday, April 27 - Friday, May 1: Waived days (5) Monday, May 4: School Resumes
Students may contact their school office if a need to enter building arises to get necessary materials for eLearning sessions.
Grab and go sack/box lunches will be available for students to pick up at the OC campus from

10:30 - 11:30 daily (excluding Spring Break dates (March 23-27)). BTS and FES parents/ students may call in prior to 9:00 AM daily and order lunch to be delivered
to the BTS or FES building. Student will be met at door.
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact the building principal office or the EGSC Administrative Office.
